name: Car Parkour
description:
Are you bored of doing the same thing? Take a break and try this racing game of Car Parkour!

The given game is a perfect example of human imagination. We propose to raise your adrenaline level more than usual with the help of a sports car that is predestined for parkour elements. Your mission is to choose a car to your liking and start on a path full of risk and unforeseen moments.

Be careful not to fall and to reach the final destination of each level. The belt will not save you here, so pay maximum attention to the movements you make.

Game Features :
- 8 supercars
- Realistic car control
- Saving checkpoints
